text: Arau maraubasisakalara majata yisakale tomalokara ocarae pajarae ache sihamtara kichumana haiche munaphika lagate madinabasira majato kichumana ache, sihamte niphakbara carama simata upanita haiche. Tumi sihamtaka najana; kintu ami sihamtaka cini pa'om. Anatipalame ami sihamtaka dubara sasti pradana karaima tara pichata sihamtaka mahasastira pine pratyarartana karaoraa haâ€™ba
